data.eml:eml: On some minuscule spiders (Araneae: Theridiosomatidae, Symphytognathidae) from the Chocó region of Ecuador with the description of ten new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dupérré, Nadine, Tapia, Elicio (2017): On some minuscule spiders (Araneae: Theridiosomatidae, Symphytognathidae) from the Chocó region of Ecuador with the description of ten new species. Zootaxa 4341 (3): 375-399, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.3.3
